name: Altum
description:
Altum is a third-person action-adventure game. You play as Dorian, an experienced traveler.  Armed with his trusty sword,  makeshift axe, and a few magical abilities, you travel with Dorian as he searches for the origin of the humanoid sea creatures appearing near the coast. 

Features
  • Two levels
  • An epic boss fight
  • Hand-crafted environments
  • Student-Created assets
  • Playtime of 10-20 minutes
